mapper.insert: insert into admin (adm_id, adm_name, adm_sexual, us_id, adm_state, adm_city, adm_address, adm_password, adm_phone, adm_remarks) values (#{admId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admSexual,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{admCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update admin set adm_name = #{admName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adm_sexual = #{admSexual,jdbcType=INTEGER}, us_id = #{usId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adm_state = #{admState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, adm_city = #{admCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adm_address = #{admAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adm_password = #{admPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adm_phone = #{admPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adm_remarks = #{admRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where adm_id = #{admId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select adm_id, adm_name, adm_sexual, us_id, adm_state, adm_city, adm_address, adm_password, adm_phone, adm_remarks from admin where adm_id = #{admId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select adm_id, adm_name, adm_sexual, us_id, adm_state, adm_city, adm_address, adm_password, adm_phone, adm_remarks from admin
